com.cookrecipe.binghao.cookrecipe.controller

Class RecipeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cookrecipe.binghao.cookrecipe.controller.RecipeController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(path="/cookrecipe")
public class RecipeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to create the controller to control the services of this application.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Bing Hao

    • Method Detail

      • getAllRecipes

        @GetMapping(path="/recipe")
public java.util.List<RecipeDTO> getAllRecipes()
        This is the GET request to retreive all the Recipes inside the database when user send it.
        Returns:
        returning all the Recipes from repository.

      • getAllCatogory

        @GetMapping(path="/category")
public java.util.List<CategoryDTO> getAllCatogory()
        This is the GET request to retreive all the Categories and Recipes inside the database when user send it.
        Returns:
        returning all the Categories and Recipes inside from repository.

      • addRecipe

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                value="/recipe")
public void addRecipe(@RequestBody
                                                                                      RecipeDTO recipedto)
        This is the request to allow user to create new Recipe in application. The data that user pass in will go to recipedto and then store into actual database.
        Parameters:
        recipedto - Data transfer objects of Recipe

      • updateRecipe

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                value="/recipe")
public void updateRecipe(@RequestBody
                                                                                        RecipeDTO recipedto)
        This is the request to allow user to update the Recipe in application. The data that user overwrite the recipedto's data and then store into actual database.
        Parameters:
        recipedto - recipedto Data transfer objects of Recipe

      • deleteRecipe

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/recipe/{id}")
public void deleteRecipe(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                int id)
        This is the request to allow user to delete the Recipe in application. The id will be pass into the recipeService, based on the recipe id, the recipe which have same id in repository will be delete.
        Parameters:
        id - Recipe id

      • deleteIngredient

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/recipe/ingredient/{iid}")
public void deleteIngredient(@PathVariable(value="iid")
                                                                                                                int iid)
        This is the request to allow user to delete the ingredients of recipe in application. The id will be pass into the ingredientService, based on the ingredient id, the ingredient which have same id in repository will be delete.
        Parameters:
        iid - Recipe's ingredient id

      • deleteStep

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                value="/recipe/step/{sid}")
public void deleteStep(@PathVariable(value="sid")
                                                                                                    int sid)
        This is the request to allow user to delete the steps of recipe in application. The id will be pass into the stepService, based on the step id, the step which have same id in repository will be delete.
        Parameters:
        sid - Recipe's step id
